original_text: but there were still seven Israelite tribes who had not yet received their inheritance.
korean_text: 그러나 이스라엘 자손 중에 그 기업의 분배를 받지 못한 자가 아직도 일곱 지파라

sentences.original_text: but there were still seven Israelite tribes
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 아직 이스라엘 지파 일곱 개가 있었는데

sentences.original_text: who had not yet received their inheritance.
